CustomField.description: BM 5/22/13 - changed data type to Text to permit bad email data BM 1/2/13 - Created for Services SFDC Interfaces Project. This field holds an external email address for a contact from an external source. It will only have a value if the data originates outside of SFDC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field holds an external email address for a contact from an external source. It will only have a value if the data originates outside of SFDC.
CustomField.label: External Email Addr
